name: In The Bag
storyline:
'In the bag" is puzzle game, where your main goal is to beat your coleague John,(who is very competative), in competition for employee of the month. 
You will be abble to customise your character and just simply start your work journey. Your character is working in a small supermarket as a bag packer. Your job is to pack customers shopping into the bag as fast as possible during your daily shift. Each customer is different and comes with randomly selected events (mobility restriction, physics symulation,...) obstractles and increasing difficulty, which might test your strenght and deduction skills. There are three different abilities, which can help you to achieve your daily goals, but you have to earn them with hard work. 
Your goal should be to beath John and win title "Employee of the month" which comes with trophy and also your personal picture hanging by the main entrance to the supermarket.
summary: Find out, if you can become an employee of the month in small supermarket. Your job is to pack as many customers bags as you can. You will have to work fast and smart and also be able to deal with randomly generated events, which may make your life harder.
